resources.string: Unexpected error occurred. We are working on it.
Something technically is wrong. We are working on it.
Oops! Something went wrong on the server. We are working on it.
Looks like the server is taking to long to respond, this can be caused by either poor connectivity or an error with our servers. Please try again in a while
Can\'t connect to the server. Please make sure you\'re connected to the internet.
